member.name: T:eZet.EveLib.Modules.EveCentral
member.summary: Class for accessing the EveCentral API

member.name: M:eZet.EveLib.Modules.EveCentral.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new EveCentral object, with a default base uri and request handler.

member.name: M:eZet.EveLib.Modules.EveCentral.GetMarketStat(eZet.EveLib.Modules.EveCentralOptions)
member.summary: Returns aggregate statistics for the items specified.
member.param: Valid options; Items, HourLimit, MinQuantity, Regions, Systems

member.name: M:eZet.EveLib.Modules.EveCentral.GetMarketStatAsync(eZet.EveLib.Modules.EveCentralOptions)
member.summary: Returns aggregate statistics for the items specified.
member.param: Valid options; Items, HourLimit, MinQuantity, Regions, Systems

member.name: M:eZet.EveLib.Modules.EveCentral.GetQuicklook(eZet.EveLib.Modules.EveCentralOptions)
member.summary: Returns all of the available market orders, including prices, stations, order IDs, volumes, etc.
member.param: Valid options; Items, HourLimit, MinQuantity, Regions, Systems

member.name: M:eZet.EveLib.Modules.EveCentral.GetQuicklookAsync(eZet.EveLib.Modules.EveCentralOptions)
member.summary: Returns all of the available market orders, including prices, stations, order IDs, volumes, etc.
member.param: Valid options; Items, HourLimit, MinQuantity, Regions, Systems

member.name: M:eZet.EveLib.Modules.EveCentral.GetQuicklookPath(System.Object,System.Object,System.Int64,eZet.EveLib.Modules.EveCentralOptions)
member.summary: Retrieve all of the available market orders, including prices, stations, order IDs, volumes, etc., on a given jump path.

member.name: M:eZet.EveLib.Modules.EveCentral.GetQuicklookPathAsync(System.Object,System.Object,System.Int64,eZet.EveLib.Modules.EveCentralOptions)
member.summary: Retrieve all of the available market orders, including prices, stations, order IDs, volumes, etc., on a given jump path.

member.summary: Retrieves the eve central market history
